backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor, integrating authorization and blob storage mixins, and declares all domain types for organizations, CRM, HRMS, ecommerce, and related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for deployment readiness UI and deployment checklist.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of multiple frontend files, explaining their roles in UI, state management, routing, and admin features.
frontend/ACTIVITY_2_DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST: Step-by-step deployment checklist for Activity 2, including prerequisites, verification steps, migration notes, and common issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theme styles, and global base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page containing the root div and script loader for the frontend React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application entry defining layout, routing, providers, and initialization flows including deployment readiness and setup modals.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: UI to list, create, edit, and delete product categories using dialog forms and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Displays all orders in a table and allows updating order status with visual badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: Lists organizations and provides a dialog form to create new ones with name and description.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Manages products including creation, editing, deletion, and category assignment via a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: CRUD interface for contacts with identity-based ownership and dialog-driven form editing.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: Manages sales leads, including creation, stage updates, and linking to contacts using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Provides UI and logic to list, create, edit, and delete CRM opportunities using dialog forms and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Displays a sales pipeline dashboard with stage counts, progress bars, and summary metrics fetched from pipeline and lead queries.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentReadin: Admin-only banner displaying deployment readiness status with access control and Stripe configuration checks and recommended actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding, a heart icon, and a GitHub link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation header with auth handling, org switching, admin links, and cart access.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Placeholder component showing a card for attendance tracking with no functional features yet.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: Implements CRUD management for departments with dialogs, forms, and a table backed by department query hooks.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: Handles adding, editing, and deleting employees with form dialogs and department selection, using HR dashboard and employee queries.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: Displays pending leave requests with options to approve or reject them, using leave query mutations.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Placeholder card for payroll management with no implemented functionality yet.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Placeholder component for employee performance tracking, showing a coming-soon message.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Dropdown menu to view and switch between available organizations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for creating a basic user profile by submitting a name.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin‑only modal to configure Stripe by entering a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: UI for listing, adding, and deleting wallets with form inputs and status handling.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Displays wallet balances and recent transactions with auto‑refresh behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a cart context with item storage in localStorage and functions to add, remove, update, and clear cart items.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Manages the active organization based on user identity and localStorage, fetching organizations and syncing selection state.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Handles wallet connector availability, selection, connection state, and identity management for supported wallet providers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, persistence, and identity state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data including deployment readiness, user profiles, and various ERP entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports the wallet connector hook from its context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for app styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing analytics metrics and management tabs, with access control and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page handling item updates, Stripe or ICP checkout, wallet connection, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: CRM dashboard for admins displaying CRM stats and management sections with access control and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: HRMS dashboard providing employee, department, attendance, payroll, and performance management with admin‑only access.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: User orders page listing past orders with status, details, and cancellation support.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Page displaying a payment failure message with navigation options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Page confirming successful payment, clearing the cart, and linking to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Product catalog page with search, category filtering, loading skeletons, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for products, categories, orders, CRM, HR, and analytics used across the app.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Utility to shorten identity strings by truncating the middle.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL and session parameter utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing parameters.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Wallet connector implementing Oisy wallet availability checks, connection, disconnection, and state retrieval.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Wallet connector for Plug handling availability, connect flow, disconnect, and connection state.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Type declarations for Plug and Oisy in‑page wallet providers on the window object.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registry that instantiates and returns available wallet connectors by ID.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Shared wallet connector interfaces and types including provider IDs and identity info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s overall state, listing major implemented ERP features including authentication, RBAC, user profiles, Stripe integration, and frontend/backend capability status. Serves as a structured inventory of existing functionality with versioned feature metadata.
